page.title: 13TRANSPORT
page.content: As the houses are scattered throughout the area and Oswestry town is beyond walking distance for most inhabitants the{family car}is vital. It enables journeys to school and work - so few actually work at home. Only the elderly who dislike driving, and the young who have not reached the age of seventeen to be old enough for a driving licence, seem to be without their own{transport.}Some families have two cars as both husband and wife go out to work. Wednesday is{market} {day}in nearby Oswestry. On this day the bus service operates between Llansilin and Oswestry. For journeys further afield people travel to Oswestry to catch buses. The nearest railway station is at Gobowen where nine trains run each day to Chester or to Shrewsbury. Here connections can be made with the rest of the country.
